188396.グランドタイタス号の\n倉庫の 撮影に成功した！\n<br>\n<pc>は\n倉:
Grand Titus warehouse photo shoot was
successful! <pc> received Storage
Photo (Key Item)!<me 60>

189554.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「まあ <pc>:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>Well <pc>. I see that you
have brought the items I requested.
Please, please give them to me.

189555.「まあ <pc>さまっ。\n いじわるをせずに 渡してくださいませ。:
Well <pc>. Please give it to
me without any tampering.

189556.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「<pc>さま:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr><pc> Thank you. Yes, there is
no doubt. This crate is a toy box my
mother gave to me as a little girl.

189557.「…………やっぱり 同じ。\n 私 知っています。\n この倉庫に かかっている:
I knew it. It's the same. I know. I know the magic that is in this warehouse. At the time, I thought it
was magic, but now I understand. This warehouse is equipped with the same organizing mechanism as the Cherry
Wood Crate that brought to us. Or, rather, it was. Unfortunately, the power of the
warehouse has been lost. My mother taught me that the basic principle of organization is "where" and "what" to
put things. That's what my mother taught me. Don't worry, leave it to me. Let's start organizing warehouse!
will help you, too.

189558.「大きな倉庫でも 小さなおもちゃ箱でも\n 原理は同じ。倉庫にかかっていた整理術:
The principles are the same whether you have a big warehouse or a small toy box, and the organization
techniques used in the warehouse are very basic. The important thing is to classify things! This is where the
Rust-Proof Plate that got for me comes in handy.

189559.「さあ 収納です！ プレートに従って\n すぐに必要なものは 手前に。そうでない:
Now for storage! Follow the plate and put what you need immediately in the front. Put the things you don't need
immediately in the front, and the things you don't need immediately in the back or in a corner! Orientation
must be aligned!

189560.「<pc>さま ありがとうございます。\n 見てください あんなにあった木箱を\:
Thank you. Look how I was able to store all those crates in the warehouse! Actually, I was having
a bit of trouble. I was thinking that I need to develop a new way of organizing things to be of more use to
the world. I remember my mother telling me to remember the basics of organizing when I was feeling a bit
restless.

189561.<icon_exc>「ああっ 大変です！\n じつは ゴーレック様に内緒で\n:
Oh, my God! I'm here without Mr. Golek's knowledge, so I have to hurry back! Could you please
inform Director Sugimu that I've repaired the organizational system on the Grand Titus. If you follow the
newly installed plate, anyone can easily store your cargo in the warehouse without me.

189569.「じつは 私 ゴーレック様に内緒で\n こちらに来たので \n 急いで戻らないと:
Actually, I came here without Mr. Golek's knowledge and I have to hurry back. Could you please
inform Director Sugimu that I have restored the arrangement that was on the Grand Titus. If you follow the
newly installed plate, anyone can easily store your cargo in the warehouse without me.

189562.ササラナに 桜細工の木箱と\n防サビプレートを 渡しますか？<yesno><ca:
Would you give Sasalana the Cherry
Wood Crate and Rust-Proof Plate?<yesno><case 1><break><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

189563.<pc>は ササラナに\n桜細工の木箱と 防サビプレートを 渡した！:
<pc> gave Sasalana the Cherry
Wood Crate and Rust-Proof Plate!

189564.ササラナは 桜細工の木箱の\nふたをあけて しばらく中を見つめた後\nゆっくりと:
Sasalana opened the lid of the Cherry Wood Crate and stared inside for a while, then slowly looked around the
warehouse.

189565.ササラナは 貼ってあった 古い金属札をはがし\n代わりに 防サビプレートに 記号:
Sasalana peeled off the old metal tag and instead wrote something like a symbol on the Rust-Proof Plate and
stuck it on!

189566.<pc>が プレートを見ながら\n積荷を移動すると その空間に吸い込まれるように:
When moves the cargo while looking at the plate, the crate is easily stored in the warehouse as
if it were sucked into the space!

189567.グランドタイタス号の 倉庫整理が終わった！\n全ての積荷を 収納することができた:
Grand Titus warehouse clearance is
complete! All the cargo has been
stored!<me 71>

189568.港町レンドアへ 戻りますか？<yesno><close>:
Would you like to return to Port Town
Lendor?<yesno><close>

190109.ブルーの木箱が 置かれている。: A BLUE CRATE has been placed.

78102.「<pc>。すでに聞いただろうが この船は\n グランゼドーラ王国へ 行けるよう:
. As you have already heard, this ship can now sail to Gran Zedora Kingdom. Our long-cherished dream has finally been
fulfilled. This is thanks to Hollow-sama who remodeled the compass and you who retrieved it from the monster at that time. I thank you
once again.

78103.「<pc>。すでに聞いただろうが この船は\n グランゼドーラ王国へ 行けるよう:
. As you have already heard, this ship can now sail to Gran Zedora Kingdom. Our long-cherished dream has finally been
fulfilled. This is thanks to Hollow-sama who remodeled the compass and you who retrieved it from the monster at that time. I thank you
again. However, there is one concern that weighs heavily on my mind right now. It is about the tool bag that a certain engineer
left behind. . I am sorry, but could you please deliver the bag of tools left at the Ship Bureau in South Port Lendor to the
clocksmith who lives in Ragi Snowfield?

78104.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「おお！ 引き受:
Oh! You'll take care of it? Thank you more than the ocean. As for the Engineer's Toolbag, you'll have to ask the Ship Bureau's Yakkoi.
Now then, I'm counting on you! !

78105.「おお！ 引き受けてくれるか！\n ……と言いたいところだが キミは\n 他の頼:
Oh! You'll take care of it? I'd say yes, but you seem to have your hands full with other requests. I have no choice. I'll ask you to
take care of this mission the next time.

78106.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「そうか……。\n:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>I see. I will accept your rejection with a
heart as wide as the sea.

78107.「今…… ひとつの気がかりが\n わしの胸に 重くのしかかっている。それは\n:
One concern is weighing heavily on my mind at
the moment. It is about a tool bag that an
engineer left behind.<open_irai><bw_break>

78108.「そのかばんのことは 船舶管理局の\n ヤッコイという局員に聞けば わかる。\n:
The bag can be found at the Ship Bureau by
asking a clerk named Yakkoi. Deliver it to the
clocksmith who lives in Ragi Snowfield.<bw_break>

90321.<close_irai>「では 頼んだぞ！ <pc>よ！！:
<close_irai>Well then, I'm counting on you! <pc>
yo!

78109.「今…… ひとつの気がかりが\n わしの胸に 重くのしかかっている。それは\n:
One concern is weighing heavily on my mind at
the moment. It is about a tool bag that an
engineer left behind.<open_irai><bw_break>

78110.「どうやら 船舶管理局にいる ヤッコイ局員から\n 工具かばんを 受け取ってくれ:
It appears that you received a tool bag from Clerk Yakkoi at the Ship Bureau. Then deliver it to Bajeo, who lives in the cabin at Ragi
Snowfield in Ogreed Continent. I'm asking you! .

78111.「<pc>。\n どうやら バジェオに 工具かばんを\n 届けてくれたようだな。:
. Looks like you delivered the tool bag to Bajeo. Oh, well. Did you get my message? Thank you ! This is my
heartfelt thanks.

78112.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「何度も 迷いの:
I have learned through many magical mist storms that it is the motive force Bajeo has created that keeps us moving smoothly in the
direction of the compass. It was Bajeo's power source that enabled me to smoothly move in the direction of the compass. He must have thought
more broadly than I did, and brought the Grand Titus back to life. With the return of the great engineer, Bajeo, the worries that had
weighed so heavily on my mind were gone. My mind has now escaped the magical mist.

78113.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「偉大なる技師バ:
The great engineer Bajeo has returned to work, and the cares that had been weighing heavy on my heart have vanished. My heart has now
escaped the magical mist. And I love the Grand Titus even more now that I know of its embrace, which accepts any kind of power
equipment. I must become a big human being who is not bound by small things like this ship.

69852.「お客さま。申し訳ございません。\n ただいま 客室の準備をしております。\n<:
Customer. We apologize for the inconvenience. We are currently preparing the guest room. We will be
able to show you the guest rooms in a few minutes, so please wait while you look around the ship.

69853.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「とうとう 出港:
I'm so glad we're finally leaving! I've always wanted to be a Grand Titus crew member. Some people say this
voyage is dangerous, but I don't mind. I'll do my best for our guests!

69854.「ご乗船くださいまして ありがとうございます。\n 本船は レンダーシアの大国\:
Thank you for coming aboard. The ship is now sailing to the port of Gran Zedora Kingdom, the great country of
Lendersia. Please enjoy your stay until our arrival in Lendersia. The bridge is open to the public. Please
visit the bridge on the top floor for a chance to see the Magic Compass up close.

69855.「無事に レンダーシアへ行けるのかしら……？\n 魔法の羅針盤があれば 迷いの霧:
I wonder if we can make it to Lendersia in one piece? You said that with Magic Compass we can get out of
the magical mist.

69856.「オレは レンダーシアを見てみたいっていう\n 好奇心で この船に乗ったんだが:
I came on board out of curiosity to see Lendersia, but it seems that some of you came on board with more sincere
desires. We have been out of touch with Lendersia for a long time. Those of you who have family or lovers out
there must be worried.

69857.「以前は この階の 赤い扉の先にある\n 大広間で 毎晩のように\n 華やかな舞:
They used to have a grand ball every night in the Great Hall, which is located on this floor behind the red
door. They don't hold balls now because they don't know what's going on with Lendersia. It's a pity.

69858.「この先は 操舵室だ。\n<br>\n「魔法の羅針盤の 材料を集めてくれた人たち:
At the end of the road is a bridge. I had opened the bridge to let the people who collected the materials for
Magic Compass take a good look at it, but I didn't expect this.

69859.「はぁぁ…… グランドタイタス号ってのは\n 想像してた以上に 豪華な船だべなぁ:
Haaa... The Grand Titus is a more luxurious ship than I had imagined. I'm very restless. I bought a boarding pass a
long time ago, so I just wandered off and got on. I feel like I made a terrible mistake in my choice.

76050.豪華な船の模型がある。\n『初代グランドタイタス号』\nと書かれている。:
There is a model of a luxurious ship.
It is labeled "The First Grand Titus.

69860.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「大きい船だねえ:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>It's a big ship. The food is delicious
and the beds are soft. I want to stay
on it forever!

69861.大広間への扉には カギが かかっている。: The door to the Great Hall is locked.

140929.タルの中から\nそこはかとない気配を感じる……。: Inside the barrel, a faint presence can be felt...

76051.「昔は グランドタイタス号への乗船を\n 許されたのは 身分の高い貴族と\n ご:
In the old days, it was only high ranking nobles and a very few Tycoon's that were allowed to board the Grand
Titus. But of course it would be better if anyone could go to Lendersia like now. The more people, the more
fun the boat trip will be.

69863.「ただいま 諸事情により\n お部屋への ご案内は中止しております。\n 申し訳:
We are sorry to inform you that we are not showing rooms at this time due to various reasons. We apologize for the
inconvenience.

69864.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「いったーい！\:
Oops! A red-haired sailor pushed me as hard as he could just now. What? That sailor? He went downstairs. That red-
haired guy must be Mavok. That's unforgivable!

69865.「お客さま。\n お騒がせしておりまして 申し訳ありません。\n<br>\n「え:
Dear customer. I apologize for the trouble I've caused you. Eh? The sailor with red hair? If it's him, he
ran toward the rear deck on this floor.

69866.<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>「魔法の羅針盤が:
<attr><feel_angry_one><end_attr>I hear Magic Compass is gone. It's not
good to let anyone see your compass!

69867.「船員たちの様子が あわただしいな……。\n 必死に 何かを探しているようだった:
The sailors seem to be in a hurry. They seemed to be frantically searching for something. I wonder if
they're all right.

69868.<attr><feel_angry_lv3><end_attr>「もうっ 信じら:
Oh, my God, I can't believe it! Suddenly, the ship's crew came in and started rummaging through the room!
The captain apologized that it was an emergency, but it's so rude to go through a lady's luggage!

69869.「オレは ずっと ここで見張ってたが\n 怪しいヤツなんて来なかった……。\n:
I've been keeping watch her the whole time, and never saw any suspicious persons... And yet, how did the Magic Compass go missing?
Hmm? The red-haired sailor? Aah... You're talking about the new guy, Mavok.
Now that you mention it, he did recently come from the wheelhouse, huh. I don't know where he is now, on board somewhere looking for the Magic Compass, right?

69870.「なんか すんごい勢いで\n 赤い髪の船員さんが 走ってきて\n そこの扉から:
A red-haired sailor with a bit of a bad energy about him came running and went out the door onto the deck...
He seemed to be carrying something big, but, uhh, what was it?

69871.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「怪しい人物を:
The sailor asked me if I'd seen anyone suspicious. The sailor asked me, "Have you seen anyone suspicious? Is this a
case? I'm kind of getting excited!

76052.<pc>は 望遠鏡をのぞいた。\n<br>\n見渡す限り 海は おだやかなようだ:
<pc> looked through the
Telescope. The sea seemed calm as far
as the eye could see.

69872.「お待たせいたしました。\n 客室の準備が整いましたので ご希望の\n お客さま:
Thank you for your patience. The guest rooms are now ready and will be reserved for the guests who wish to
stay in them. While you are resting, the ship will arrive at the port of Gran Zedora Kingdom. Would you like to
be shown to your room?

69873.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「それでは 引き:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>We hope you continue to enjoy your
cruise on the Grand Titus.

69874.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「では ご案内さ:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Let me show you around. This way,
please.

69875.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「<pc>さまで:
. I understand that you have been working hard to get the Magic Compass back from the monster.
With that compass, the magical mist is no obstacle. We will surely take you to Lendersia.

69876.「キミが取り戻してくれた羅針盤は そこにある。\n 今は 特に 変わった様子はな:
The compass that YOU gave me back is there. It doesn't look any different now, but it will show its power in the
magical mist. Soon the ship will enter the magical mist. We will take care of the voyage, and you can relax in the
guest room!

69877.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「赤髪のマボッ:
I can't believe that red-haired Mavok was a monster. I can't believe he worked so hard to get on the Grand
Titus. He said he had things to do once the ship was ready to sail, and he was willing to take on jobs that
everyone else didn't want to do. I thought he was a good person.

69878.「いろいろと 不手際がございまして\n 申し訳ありませんでした。\n 本船は ま:
We apologize for any inconvenience caused. The ship will soon be entering the magical mist. When you have
finished your business on board, please ask the guest room attendant at the counter over there.

69879.「迷いの霧が そこまで迫っているわね。\n 魔法の羅針盤が 見つかってよかったわ:
The magical mist is almost upon us. I'm glad we found the Magic Compass. There was no way we were going to turn
back after coming this far. Now we just have to wait and see how the Magic Compass, created by the amazing
Sage, will work out.

69880.「どうやら 船員たちの探しものは\n 見つかったようだな。\n 迷いの霧に 突入:
Looks like the sailors found what they were looking for. They were getting ready to breach the magical mist. The
passage to and from Lendersia has been interrupted for quite some time now. It's exciting to think that we're
finally arriving.

69881.「えっ？ 船員たちが 探していたのは\n 魔法の羅針盤だったの！？\n<br>\:
What? The sailors were looking for the Magic Compass! It can't be helped if something so important is missing.
I'll forgive the sailors for opening my luggage and looking at my underwear for once.

69882.「あんたには 世話になっちまったな。\n まさか 魔物が 船員に化けて\n 乗り:
I'm so grateful for your help. I was also surprised that the monster had disguised itself as a sailor to get on
board.

69883.「オラぁ 見ちまっただよ。\n 赤髪の船員が 魔物になったのを……。\n<br>:
I've seen it. I saw the red-haired sailor turned into a monster. I'm sure that if we go to Lendersia, we'll be
attacked by a lot of those monsters. That's a big story.

69884.「……なになに？\n なくなった 魔法の羅針盤が見つかって\n 事件は 解決した:
What's going on? The missing Magic Compass has been found and the case is closed? Oh, no. I was just about to
show you my best guess! It's all over now, isn't it?

76053.魔法の羅針盤だ。\n今は 何も反応を示していないようだ。:
Magic Compass. Nothing seems to be
responding at the moment.

69885.「ひさしぶりの航海だが\n この日のために 訓練を続けていたんだ。\n 舵さばき:
It's been a long time since I've sailed, but I've been training for this day. My ruddermanship has not
slowed down. Rest assured.

69886.「船内での ご用が お済みでしたら\n お部屋まで ご案内させていただきます。\:
If you are done with your business on board, we will escort you to your cabin. The ship will arrive at Lendor
Island while you are resting. Would you like to be shown to your room?

69887.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「それでは 引き:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>We hope you continue to enjoy your
cruise on the Grand Titus.

69888.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「では ご案内さ:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Let me show you around. This way,
please.

69889.「船内での ご用が お済みでしたら\n お部屋まで ご案内させていただきます。\:
If you are done with your business on board, we will escort you to your room. The ship will arrive in
Lendersia while you are resting. Would you like to be shown to your room?

69890.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「それでは 引き:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>We hope you continue to enjoy your
cruise on the Grand Titus.

69891.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「では ご案内さ:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Let me show you around. This way,
please.

69892.「わたくしどもが レンダーシア側の停泊地とした\n ココラタの浜辺は グランゼド:
Our anchorage on the Lendersia side of the island is Cocolata Beach, which is considerably southwest of Gran Zedora
Kingdom. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause you, but please take the overland route to Gran
Zedora Kingdom.

69893.「不本意ではあるが 本船は\n レンダーシア北西部の ココラタの浜辺と\n レン:
It is with great reluctance that I announce that this vessel will operate as a liner between Cocolata Beach and
Lendor Island in the northwestern part of Lendersia. I wish I could send everyone to the port of Gran Zedora
Kingdom, but the current is so abnormal that I can't get close to the waters of Gran Zedora. This has never
happened before.

69894.「ご乗船くださいまして ありがとうございます。\n 本船は レンドア島の港へ向け:
Thank you for coming aboard. The ship is now sailing to the port of Lendor Island. If you have any business on
board, please ask for the guest room attendant at the counter over there.

69895.「ご乗船くださいまして ありがとうございます。\n 本船は レンダーシアの北西部:
Thank you for coming aboard. The ship is now sailing to Cocolata Beach, northwest of Lendersia. If you have
any business on board, please ask for the guest room attendant at the counter over there.

69896.「魔法の羅針盤って 意外に やるわね。\n 迷いの霧の中の ひどい嵐から 船を守:
Magic Compass is surprisingly good. It's quite a thing to be able to guide and protect a ship from a terrible
storm in the magical mist.

69897.「どうやら グランゼドーラ王国とは\n まだ 連絡が取れないままらしい。\n<b:
Apparently, there is still no contact with the Gran Zedora Kingdom. There was a man who got off the ship before
the others because he was worried about his family in Gran Zedora. I wonder if he was able to meet his
family safely.

84567.扉には カギが かかっている。\n用が済んだら 客室案内係に話しかけよう。:
The door is locked. When you are done,
talk to the guest room attendant.

69898.「レンダーシアって あんな場所だったかしら？\n うまく言えないけど すごく不気:
Was Lendersia like that place? I don't know how to describe it, but it had a very creepy atmosphere. I wasn't sure
if I wanted to travel around Lendersia alone, so I decided to enjoy the elegance of the boat ride and wait for
a wonderful partner to come along<&2a>

69899.「もう二度と 盗難事件なんか起こさないよう\n 魔法の羅針盤は しっかり見張って:
Magic Compass will be on the lookout
for any more thefts. You can continue
your journey with peace of mind!

69900.「レンダーシアは おっかねえ魔物が\n いっぱいだってウワサを 聞いちまっただよ:
I heard a rumor that Lendersia is full of very wealthy monsters. I'm going to stay on this ship for a while and
gather information about Lendersia.

69901.「ボクは しばらく この船に留まって\n 次の事件を 待つことにしたんだ！\n<:
I decided to stay on the ship for a while and wait for the next incident! A luxury cruise liner is a good place
to get involved in a case. Next time something happens, I'll solve it in style!

69902.「グランゼドーラ王国へは たどり着けなかったが\n これで レンダーシアと レン:
I never made it to the Gran Zedora Kingdom, but now the shipping line between Lendersia and Lendor Island
has been restored. I think that alone is a great step forward. Until now, communication with Lendersia had been
completely cut off.

84563.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>港町レンドアに:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>It seems we have arrived at Port Town
Lendor.

84564.ココラタの浜辺に 到着したようだ。:
Looks like we have arrived at Cocolata
Beach.

76054.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「グランゼドーラって:
Gran Zedora is far, isn't it? I'm too weak to travel on foot. I can't decide whether to go forward or return, and I
haven't been able to get off this boat for a long time now.

69903.「船内での ご用が お済みでしたら\n お部屋まで ご案内させていただきます。\:
If you are done with your business on board, we will escort you to your room. While you are resting, the ship
will arrive at the port of Gran Zedora Kingdom. Would you like to be shown to your room?

69904.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「それでは 引き:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>We hope you continue to enjoy your
cruise on the Grand Titus.

69905.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「では ご案内さ:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>Let me show you around. This way,
please.

69906.「よく来てくださいました。<pc>さま。\n <pc>さまは 賢者ホーローさまの:
Thank you very much for coming. . I understand that is an acquaintance of
Mr. Sage Hollow. After we returned to Lendor Island, we discussed with Hollow the fact that we could not go
to the port of Gran Zedora Kingdom and asked him to investigate. Hollow told us that the magical mist must have led
the ship to another world, and he modified the Magic Compass for us. I could not believe it at first glance,
but it certainly made a lot of sense. We are still taking the route to Cocolata Beach in consideration of our
customers, whom we have sent to such a world, even though they were unaware of it.

69907.「ホーローさまが改造した 羅針盤のおかげで\n 迷いの霧を抜けた後も 異世界に向:
Thanks to the compass that Mr. Hollow modified, I can now go to Gran Zedora without going to another world even
after leaving the magical mist. I could not believe it at first glance, but now that you put it that way, it
makes a lot of sense. In consideration of our guests that we have sent to such a world, albeit unknowingly, we
are still taking the route to Cocolata Beach.

69908.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「ココラタの浜:
The passengers coming from Cocolata Beach are all people we have sent from Lendor Island in the past. We have
never had any locals on board. I hear that the people who live on that beach are a little strange, and I'm a little
worried.

69909.「ご乗船くださいまして ありがとうございます。\n あの魔法の羅針盤が 新しくな:
Thank you for coming aboard. The Magic Compass has been redesigned and can now sail to the Gran Zedora Kingdom,
but will continue to sail to Cocolata Beach. However, we will continue to sail to Cocolata Beach as before. co-captain, Mr. Dudley, would like to discuss this further with you. Please visit our Vice Captain at the bridge.

69910.「ご乗船くださいまして ありがとうございます。\n 本船は レンダーシアの大国\:
Thank you for coming aboard. The ship is now sailing to the port of Gran Zedora Kingdom, the great country of
Lendersia. If you have any business on board, please ask for the guest room attendant at the counter over there.

69911.<attr><feel_normal_one><end_attr>「新しい魔法の:
Thanks to the new Magic Compass, I can freely go to Gran Zedora Kingdom and Cocolata Beach. I always get dizzy for
a moment when I exit the magical mist towards Cocolata Beach. I just can't get used to that eerie feeling.

69912.「レンダーシアと 連絡が途絶えていた間に\n グランゼドーラ王国は 魔王軍の襲撃:
I heard that while Lendersia was out of contact, the Gran Zedora Kingdom was attacked by the Demon King's army
and Prince Toma's life was taken. He must have been in a terrible state of helplessness, with no other country to
help him. I'm sorry to hear that we didn't know about it.

69913.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「アンルシア姫が:
I also happened to be at Gran Zedora Castle when Princess Anlucia came back as a Hero! The celebration party was
beautiful! It was such a historic moment for me to be there, because now this ship can go to Gran Zedora. I
have to thank the new Magic Compass!

69914.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「新しい魔法の羅:
<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>The new Magic Compass has allowed me
to go to Gran Zedora. That's quite a
feat for you, sage!

69915.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「ココラタの浜辺:
The stories of those coming from Cocolata Beach and those coming from Gran Zedora Kingdom are completely
different. The missing princess has come back as a hero, the hero princess has closed the customs, etc. It's hard
to believe that they are from the same Lendersia. There are also scary rumors that this ship is traveling between
two worlds. I'll try to gather more information here.

69916.「グランゼドーラ王国に 行けるようになったのに\n ココラタの浜辺にも 定期船を:
Why would they send a liner to Cocolata Beach when they can now go to Gran Zedora Kingdom? There's a certain
something that smells fishy about it. Could it be a case? I might be the one to solve it in a spectacular way!

69917.「グランゼドーラ王国を目指して\n 迷いの霧を抜けた時は いつも おだやかな海と:
Whenever I go through the magical mist toward Gran Zedora Kingdom, I always see the calm sea and the clean sky,
but when I go through the magical mist toward Cocolata Beach, I see the mysterious and mysterious sky and the
sea filled with eerie silence. This boat is the only way to go between the two worlds. I can believe it when they
say that this boat goes back and forth between the two worlds.

84565.ココラタの浜辺（偽りの世界）に\n到着したようだ。:
It seems that we have arrived at
Cocolata Beach (a false world).

88126.グランゼドーラ王国（真の世界）に\n到着したようだ。:
It seems we have arrived at the Gran
Zedora Kingdom (the world of the
true).

76055.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「グランゼドーラ:
I saw the castle of Gran Zedora for the first time, and it was as beautiful as I had heard. It is indeed
the castle of Hero. I was also able to see Anlucia with my own eyes, and I was very satisfied with my visit. I
wonder where we should go sightseeing next.
